bilingual.source: When the emperor looked at himself, he only saw his underwear.
bilingual.target: 当皇帝看自己时，他只看到他的内衣。

bilingual.source: I need to buy some new underwear.
bilingual.target: 我需要买一些新的内衣。

bilingual.source: She put her underwear in the drawer.
She bought new underwear from the store.
bilingual.target: 她从商店买了新的内衣。

bilingual.source: He forgot to bring underwear on the trip.
bilingual.target: 他忘记带内衣去旅行了。

bilingual.source: This store has a variety of underwear.
bilingual.target: 这家商店有各种各样的内衣。

bilingual.source: He forgot to pack his underwear for the trip.
bilingual.target: 他忘了为旅行打包内衣。

bilingual.source: There is a lot of underwear in the washing machine.
He always wears cotton underwear for comfort.
bilingual.target: 他总是穿棉质内衣以求舒适。

bilingual.source: The drawer is full of different types of underwear.
bilingual.target: 抽屉里装满了各种类型的内衣。

list.abstract: Underwear（英[ˈʌndəweə]，美[ˈʌndərwer]），英语单词，名词，意思为衬衣；内衣。短语搭配有extra-heavy underwear（特重内衣），例句为“She stripped down to her underwear.（她脱得只剩内衣。）”
《Underwear》是富士电视台与美国Netflix合作的第一部原创电视剧，由桐谷美玲主演。该剧讲述了大学时代研究纤维布料的宅女在东京银座的高级内衣制造商就职后逐渐成长的的故事。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, we should get started. Let me show you my underwear. The selection of underwear we carry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 走吧，我带你看我的内衣...我们的内衣专柜。

yingyinNormal.en: Rach, it's not that we don't want to, really. Are we talking models in their underwear? And heels.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是我们不想去，真的模特儿穿内衣走秀？还有高跟鞋。

yingyinNormal.en: Leonard? Why haven't I heard a thing about this woman who lives across the hall and comes into your apartment in the morning, in her underwear?
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德？为什么你从来都没跟我说起过这个住在你对门的喜欢早上跑这儿来的女人，还穿着内衣。

yingyinNormal.en: Anyway, she got here today and she's just been in my apartment yakity yakking about every guy she slept with in Omaha, which is basically every guy in Omaha, and washing the sluttiest collection of underwear you have ever seen in my bathroom sink.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她今天刚到 一直呆在我房间，唧歪每一个她在奥马哈睡过的男人，差不多也就是奥马哈所有的男人，她还在我浴室水池里，洗你能想像到的最淫荡的内衣。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, let me rephrase the question. Why are you wearing long underwear?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，让我重新表述下问题，你干嘛要穿长的内衣裤啊？

yingyinNormal.en: So I need everything down to underwear, so if you're willing, I'm all yours. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我连内衣裤都要，如果你愿意，我整个人就交给你了好。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Do you think maybe it's tight because you're wearing long underwear? Yes, of course that's why it's tight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，你不觉得之所以会紧是因为你里面穿了套长的内衣裤吗？废话，当然是因为这个。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey Chandler. Come on, I'm gonna show how to roll up your underwear and stuff it in your shoes. It's a real space saver.
yingyinNormal.zh: 钱德，快来，我教你怎么把内衣裤塞进鞋子，可以省空间。

yingyinNormal.en: You might want to kickstart some underwear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可能还要去讨点内裤。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh no wait, oh no, the elastic on my underwear busted.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不对，是内裤的松紧带断了。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay! Let me just go inside and slip off my underwear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好！我先进去把内裤脱了。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you see my underwear? No, Patrick. Did you want to?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看到我的内裤了吗？没有，派崔克。你想看吗？

yingyinNormal.en: No really, you tell me what's up. I forgot my underwear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，告诉我，怎么了？听着，我忘了穿内裤。

yingyinNormal.en: Could also use some new underwear. Mine are running on fumes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也不介意来点新内裤，我的破到剩几根纤维了。

yingyinNormal.en: Can we please just go in? My chain mail's stuck in my underwear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们快点进去好吗？我的锁子甲被夹在内裤里了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh,my God. That is so not the opposite of taking somebody's underwear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的天啊，我把你的内裤藏起来，但这根本不是相反的事。

yingyinNormal.en: Underwear, a toothbrush and a Van Halen CD. I can use all these things!
yingyinNormal.zh: 内裤，牙刷，还有范海伦的CD。这些我都用得着！！

yingyinNormal.en: Good call. Seeing your Teen Titans underwear really got my motor running.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好决定。在看到你的《少年泰坦》卡通内裤后，我的确是“性致高昂”。

yingyinNormal.en: You're wearing modern underwear? Relatively modern. Why, what are you wearing?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你穿了现代的内裤？相对来说是现代的，干嘛，你穿了什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh Mon, I laughed so hard. Ho-ho, so hard we had to throw out your underwear again?
yingyinNormal.zh: 莫，我笑得很大声…你笑到又拉了一裤子？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

adj. 用旧的；用坏的；疲惫的；筋疲力尽的

word_family.mean: v. 穿着；戴着；佩着；穿破；穿旧；销蚀；磨损；耐用；耐久；耐穿；耐磨；使（船头）转向下风

examination_example.sentence: I took off my clothes—jacket, shoes, socks, <highlight>underwear</highlight> and all.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我脱下衣服、夹克、鞋子、袜子、内衣等等。

examination_example.sentence: And in different parts of the world, there are always those who believe in their “lucky <highlight>underwear</highlight>”.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在世界各地，总有人相信自己的“幸运内衣”。

examination_example.sentence: Some people might wear special <highlight>underwear</highlight> before important events.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人在重要活动前可能会穿特殊的内衣。
